title: Halsey CONFIRMS she is dating Evan Peters after falling for scare prank on Ellen DeGeneres
text:
Halsey finally confirmed her romantic relationship with Evan Peters after falling for a scare prank on The Ellen DeGeneres Show.

The singer, 25, had just been asked about dressing up as Sonny and Cher with Evan, when a man jumped out of table right beside her, scaring her.

After the stunt, Halsey remarked, 'She distracted me with the boyfriend question! I wasn't ready!'

'She distracted me with the boyfriend question!' Halsey finally confirmed her relationship with Evan Peters after falling for a scare prank on The Ellen DeGeneres Show

'I don't know what's scarier though, is having to talk about my boyfriend on TV or having that happen,' she said.

Halsey and Evans have been dating for around a month now and have been practically inseparable this Halloween season.

The couple were dressed as the I've Got You duo while attending the American Horror Story Halloween Party over the weekend, a day after leaving another bash holding hands.

The pair sparked romance rumors after they were seen a few weeks earlier at Six Flags together.

I've got you babe! The couple were dressed up as Sonny and Cher at a Halloween party over the weekend

Happy Halloween! Halsey also talked about her Marilyn Manson costume

A source told E!: 'Halsey has always been a huge fan of Evan's. A friend connected them and they had also been chatting over social media before hanging out.

'It's still very new, but they are both interested in dating each other and hanging out.'

When they were seen at Six Flags, a bystander said: 'They were laughing and flirting the whole time while we waited for the ride, it looked really romantic. It looked like they were having a fun date night.

Seems like Halsey has had her eye on Evan as far back as 2012.

'Seriously Evan Peters stop making me attracted to alleged sociopaths and accused murderers…' she tweeted at the time, referencing his characters on American Horror Story.
